name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Marshall

reviews.text: I stayed here for 13 weeks while I worked at Good Shepherd Marshall. The staff knew me. They were awesome. Everything is clean and fresh. The food served on Monday's and Wednesday's is not the tastiest, but it is free and it is dinner...two nights a week. Breakfast every morning s good. Everything is excellent at this property. Believe me I have stayed at terrible properties and this is not even close to a terrible property. Loved the pool and hot tub. My friends came over and ate some dinner a few times and kicked it in the hot tub with me!!
reviews.title: Best hotel in Marshall

reviews.text: Encountered only kindness and willingness to help, which made the stay very pleasant.
reviews.title: Personnel made the difference.

reviews.text: Staff was friendly and courteous. Hotel was attractive and spotlessly clean. Complimentary breakfast was excellent and the Manager's Wednesday Evening Welcome with appetizers was great. As a former platinum Marriott Awards Member, this Fairfield Inn & Suites was by far the best I have stayed in throughout the US.
reviews.title: Fairfield Inn & Suites, Marshall, Texas

reviews.text: Super friendly and helpful staff, particularly Caitlyn that checked us in. We were upgraded to a suite and it was very clean, great working area, good lighting. Very comfy bed. Wifi worked well. Easy access to highway. The breakfast was just ok - items had been sitting and were not the best quality - but if you just want cereal and coffee, it is fine. I would recommend hotel for the business and family. The staff are the biggest highlight as they made us right at home.
reviews.title: Friendly and helpful staff, very clean, easy on/off to highway

reviews.text: Great Room, exceptionally clean..........and great service!!!
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: I was very shocked at how reasonable the rate was here.. All of the staff was excellent and bent over backwards to make sure our stay was perfect... Everytime any of the staff came in contact with me they were asking if I needed anything... That sort of thing just don't happen anymore.. Not just in the rooms but all over, dinning room, pool, lobby, laundry room it was all very clean!!! Then when I checked out the staff ask me was there anything that they could have done to make my stay better... WOW!!!
reviews.title: GREAT!!

reviews.text: Our overall experience was excellent. The hotel worked with us on many changes and special requests. The staff was professional and always accommodating. The hotel was neat and well kept. I would recommend the hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: K Goldberg/Internet BrandsTrial

reviews.text: Pick this hotel because I use Marriott quite a bit and also they were just off the Highway so getting in and out was painless. The facility was well kept and the nice but the social hour at the end of a long driving day was sure relaxing. I did leave some medicine in my room and did not notice it until I was 175 miles away, at the time I became aware of the missing medicine I got a call from Brittany stating she would get the medicine to me. I thanked her and let her know that I would pick it up on my return the next day/night. Low and behold it was at the front desk when I went in the next night with a nice note and some cookies. I have NEVER had a hotel follow up and make me feel liked they cared as this hotel did with the missing items. If you want a friendly-clean-quiet and near a liquor store this is the place to stay-- There is also food places near also.
reviews.title: Stop over in Marshall TX

reviews.text: I'd like to thank Brittany Westmoreland (and another unknown person) at the Marshal TX site for really helping me out of a jam. I lost my wallet two day's before going on a business trip and did not have my Drivers liscence to board my flights. Using my Passport, Soc. Security card and other forms of ID, I was able to board the planes I needed to get myself to TX. Along comes Friday morning and I'm on my way home after a long week. I checked in on Delta using your Hotel P/C, printed my boarding pass and I'm off. Just as I was dropped off at the airport and about to walk through Security, I got a call from someone I was traveling with who informed me that my Passport and Soc. Card was found at the Fairfield Inn. I called the Hotel and "quickly" explained my situation to Brittany. Remember...I'm inline at the airport security on a Friday afternoon with no possibility of getting on the plane without a phota ID. Brittany was able to scan and e-mail it to me within minutes and I was able to convince the security to let me board the plane.
reviews.title: Disaster Averted!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My sincere thanks goes out to whoever found my Doc's and took the time to investigate who the person was that I was traveling with...(he booked our rooms) and to Brittany for quickly putting the info in to an e-mail and immediatly sending it to me.
reviews.title: A Very Good Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was excellent. It was a convenient stopping place on our trip out West. We were on free points, but the room they gave us was not just a room, but a suite. The staff was friendly, knowledgable, and helpful. There is a terrific (and reasonably priced) Italian restaurant within walking distance. I would recommend this hotel to everyone and will, without a doubt, stay there again.
reviews.title: Treated us royally!

reviews.text: Great stop with the family on the way to the beach. The pool was well maintained. Our room was super clean. The staff was friendly. They had beer, wine, and dinner for us when we arrived and breakfast was great. Everyone went out of their way to make us comfortable. This was one of the best hotel experiences we have ever had.
reviews.title: Great stop. Fantastic service.

reviews.text: The room was ready and waiting when we arrived. We were given a lower rate than quoted when checked in. We enjoyed a wonderful breakfast. Thanks for outstanding service.
reviews.title: Wonderful service

reviews.text: we haved stayed at Fairfield several times....this one in particular....was told after check in...pool heater was out, it was a little cool....got in hot tub...and then got in pool....something floated across my foot in the bottom of the pool...not sure what it was...:0 then was by the drain..and 8 inch hair caught in the drain were blowing out of the drain...the pool looked a little dark...:/ and also talked to a boy in the pool..he said the heater had been out a month...
reviews.title: Seen better

reviews.text: If you need to stay in this town go ahead and pick this place to lay your head.
reviews.title: The location is great and is the best hotel in Marshall.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stopped in Marshall for an unplanned overnight and chose the Fairfield Inn by chance. What luck! It was a great place. All the staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Every time we left the hotel, they greeted us, asked if we needed anything, or was there anything they could do for us. Our room was spotless, well-appointed, and quiet. The bed was very comfortable; the bathroom was large. The free breakfast was good - better than the usual continental fare and the dining room was very cozy and comfortable. We couldn't have been happier. You rarely find this kind of consideration and service any more - kudos to the staff and hotel management. We will be back!
reviews.title: Great hotel
They made me "Guest of the Day"!
reviews.text: Really nice hotel. Great breakfast. Wonderful staff. Nice pool and whirlpool. Easy to find.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.text: Fairfield Inn & Suites in Marshall, Texas really knows how to make their guests feel special. They named me "Guest of the Day", gave me a treat from their snack shop, upgraded me to a suite and surprised me when they informed me of the Wednesday night orange chicken buffet with free beer and wine. Nice!

This seems to be one of the better Fairfield Inns. It's close to the interstate, but set back far enough to be quiet. Rooms are clean,modern and nicely decorated (except for the tv which was an older style). There were a lot of nice touches such as free snacks and cookies in the afternoon and a "managers special" on weekdays. Breakfast was very good. We used the excercise room which was better than average, with 5 machines. There is an IHop restaurant adjacent to the parking lot and we saw an Italian restaurant within walking distance. Staff was friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Great Hotel & Staff

reviews.text: I stayed on this Hotel for 2 1/2 weeks on business and the experience was great. The rooms were very clean, the conference room area were very spacious and the electrical work for my equipments were set to profesion. My overall experience with The Fairfield Inn Suites was Great.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!!

description: Fairfield-Inn & Suites Marshall offers three-star accommodations perfectly suited for business and leisure-travelers. Spread among three-floors, Fairfield-Inn & Suites Marshall's accommodations range from king and queen deluxe-guest rooms to spacious executive and Jacuzzi suites. All rooms are beautifully-decorated in warm tones accented with vibrant touches. Fairfield-Inn & Suites Marshall accommodations are also furnished with plush-beds, feather and foam pillows, a flat screen TV, complimentary toiletries, wired and wireless Internet access and a microwave and refrigerator.
